title: Full Stack Software Engineering Bootcamp
description: Completed an intensive 520-hour live bootcamp, mastering full-stack development, RESTful APIs, authentication, responsive design, and agile methodologies.

title: Cloud Solutions Implementation
description: Served as a Cloud & Data Associate Consultant at Insight Enterprises. Contributed to cloud solutions implementation using Azure, designed robust data governance frameworks.

title: Cybersecurity Cloud Migration
description: Led the migration of critical Office 365 and Azure security components for a firearms manufacturer, reinforcing cybersecurity infrastructure.

title: Unfinished Project Completion
description: Rescued an unfinished project, finalized KPIs, streamlined financial reports, and collaborated with third-party resources.

title: Full Stack Web Development Projects
description: Designed and developed full-stack web applications as a freelance engineer, integrating modern web technologies to meet business needs.

title: Machine Learning Workout App
description: Co-developing a machine learning-driven workout app for personalized exercise regimens, utilizing ML algorithms and React/Next.js.

title: Virtual Reality Game
description: Developed an immersive virtual reality game using Unity and C#, focusing on interactive gameplay and stunning visuals.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Created a scalable e-commerce platform with secure payment integration and a responsive design for an enhanced user experience.

title: AWS EC2 Hosted Website
description: Deployed a fully functional web application using an AWS EC2 instance, ensuring security, scalability, and uptime monitoring for production-level performance.

title: SQL Database Management Project
description: Built an advanced SQL database management system during MIS coursework, creating complex queries to handle customer data and business metrics.

title: Marketing Analytics and A/B Testing
description: Executed A/B testing for a digital marketing campaign, optimizing email click-through rates and conversion rates. Performed statistical analysis using marketing analytics techniques.

title: Chase Sapphire Rewards Case Study
description: Performed an in-depth case study analyzing the Chase Sapphire Rewards Card, its customer segmentation, value proposition, and market impact.

title: Monster Energy HR Consulting Project
description: Developed a human resources consulting plan for Monster Energy, focusing on workforce revitalization and strategies for employee retention.

title: ERP System Analysis
description: Walked through ERP system analysis for a theoretical business, evaluating business processes and designing workflows for system integration.

title: Big Data Health Watch Analysis
description: Used Kaggle health fitness watch data to perform big data analysis using machine learning models. Conducted feature extraction and provided insights using Jupyter Notebook.

title: UX/UI Design Study
description: Studied advanced UX/UI principles, conducting user testing and designing wireframes to optimize user experience on web and mobile platforms.
